column2: short for who; used to get info about the currently logged in user
short for display files; displays info about total and available space
short for find; used to find files & directories and perform operations
short for make directory; creates a directory with a specified name in the current working directory
Protocol used to securely connect to a remote server/system
short for make; compiles given code when called in a programs build file
short for change mode; changes the access mode of a file
Searches a file for a particular pattern of characters, and displays all lines that contain that pattern
It is a user information lookup command which gives details of all the users logged in
short for processes; lists active processes & their PIDS
short for echo; used to display a line of text in the terminal
short for free space; displays the total amount of free memory in the system
short for change directory; changes the current active working directory
